Achievements.Name: Snowbird bound!
Achievements.Description: Finish Act I of the story to unlock the Snowbird resort.

Achievements.Name: Vamonos a South America!
Achievements.Description: Finish Act II of the story to unlock Valle Nevado.

Achievements.Name: Rescued Weiner Boy!
Achievements.Description: Finish Act III of the story by rescuing Weiner Boy and gaining access to the secret C.A.I. area.

Achievements.Name: Reunited…and it feels so good!
Achievements.Description: Finish Act IV of the story by rescuing the rest of the crew.

Achievements.Name: Northstar Nirvana
Achievements.Description: Impress the required number of bystanders in each area of Northstar to Own the Mountain.

Achievements.Name: Snowbird Dawg
Achievements.Description: Impress the required number of bystanders in each area of Snowbird to Own the Mountain.

Achievements.Name: VIVA VALLE!
Achievements.Description: Impress the required number of bystanders in each area of Valle Nevado to Own the Mountain.

Achievements.Name: Laax Stock & Barrel
Achievements.Description: Impress the required number of bystanders in each area of Laax to Own the Mountain.

Achievements.Name: King of the Mountain Lab
Achievements.Description: Impress the required number of bystanders in each area of DC to Own the Mountain.

Achievements.Name: Lesser Snow God
Achievements.Description: Earn any Medal for ALL challenges and media callouts.

Achievements.Name: Supreme Snow God
Achievements.Description: Earn a Gold Medal for ALL challenges and media callouts.
